$interpreted: Angelia: Hello, ma'am! The weather's quite pleasant today!
Slums Grandma: Ah Angel, hello there.
Slums Older Sister: Angel! I've baked too much bread again. Do come by and take some home with you!
Angelia: Thanks, sister
Slums Uncle: Angel, it's been a month already. Is everything going alright? Is that leak still causing you problems?
Angelia: It stopped leaking since the last time you fixed it. Thank you so much for your help.
Lio: Angel, you're such a social butterfly!
Angelia: Well, everyone is so nice and easy to get along with.
Angelia: Hyacinthus, is everything alright? Why the hurry?
Hyacinthus: Ni-Nigel's at the square quarrelling with a Tax Officer. I have to hurry over.
Hyacinthus: Something's bound to happen!
Angelia: WHAT?! Hold on, we're coming too!
Hyacinthus: Ok, hurry!
Nigel: You were here last month, what's the reason for collecting tax again so soon?!
Tax Officer: Last month was the residential tax. I'm here to collect your income tax...they're not the same!
Nigel: Hmph! You bloodsucking leeches will say anything to have it your way!
Tax Officer: Anyways, the castle is undergoing maintenance, so the money must flow. After construction, the castle's power will increase.
Tax Officer: Doesn't that benefit you lot of poor peasants as well?
Nigel: Since when have you cared for the Slums?! If you want money, go steal from the nobles!
Hyacinthus: Nigel, stay calm. Don't be like this.
Angelia: She's right, let's sit down and discuss this over, we...
Naya: Angel, don't interfere!
Angelia: Wait, I......
Nigel: Hmph, coward.
Tax Officer: See? They know what happens when you offend us. They don't dare resist, so you best back down.
Nigel: If I'm still around, not on my watch will you make trouble for everyone else here!
Tax Officer: Low life, obstructing my duties.
Tax Officer: Soldiers, ARREST HIM!
Hyacinthus: Woah, he's fighting against the Royal Infantry...
Tax Officer: These poor peasants dare to defy me! I'll be damned, take them all!
Nigel: What's that sound?
Tax Officer: M-M-M-Monster alert?
Soldier: Sir! Many monsters are headed this way!
Tax Officer: WHAT?! QUICK, everyone, escort me back, NOW!
Hyacinthus: Hey, aren't soldiers supposed to fight to the death in the name of king and country? Won't you stay to protect the people of the Slums!?
Hyacinthus: Nigel, what do we do now?
Nigel: Damn...spread the word, hide at home and don't go anywhere!
Hyacinthus: Understood!

Model.Text: Hello, ma'am! The weather's quite pleasant today!
Ah Angel, hello there.
Angel! I've baked too much bread again. Do come by and take some home with you!
Thanks, sister
Angel, it's been a month already. Is everything going alright? Is that leak still causing you problems?

Well, everyone is so nice and easy to get along with.

Nigel, stay calm. Don't be like this.
She's right, let's sit down and discuss this over, we...
Angel, don't interfere!
Wait, I......
Hmph, coward.
See? They know what happens when you offend us. They don't dare resist, so you best back down.
If I'm still around, not on my watch will you make trouble for everyone else here!
Low life, obstructing my duties.
Soldiers, ARREST HIM!
Woah, he's fighting against the Royal Infantry...
These poor peasants dare to defy me! I'll be damned, take them all!
What's that sound?
M-M-M-Monster alert?
Sir! Many monsters are headed this way!
WHAT?! QUICK, everyone, escort me back, NOW!
Hey, aren't soldiers supposed to fight to the death in the name of king and country? Won't you stay to protect the people of the Slums!?

Damn...spread the word, hide at home and don't go anywhere!
Understood!
